DOC.brief_summary: - Evaluate sleep disordered breathing before and after orthopedic surgery utilizing a FDA cleared to market (510k) home sleep study device (Nexan Inc., ClearPath System) - Compare Berlin Questionnaire and Epworth Sleep Scale questionnaires to the home sleep study device results. - Evaluate effectiveness of the home sleep study testing in the orthopedic presurgical population.
DOC.brief_title: Pre and Post Orthopedic Surgery Sleep and Cardiac Testing (PROSPECT)
DOC.criteria: Undergoing knee or hip total joint replacement Answer Yes to any PROSPECT health history questions and/or score Positive on the sleep questionnaires Tape Allergy Previous Diagnosis Of Obstructive Sleep Apnea
